lines.text: Whores. They're all trash of course, but at least they admit it. Not like Amanda. No. I would have to correct that.
If you would like to confess...
Confess? What are you a priest? I've never confessed to anyone in my life.
[to Janek after talking to several hookers regarding the murder of one]
I never thought I would say this about New York, but I'm running out of hookers.
